meanings.definition: A traditional unit of currency in Albania.
meanings.sent1: In Albania, you can buy many things with just one lek.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for lek at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent3: The lek in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew slowly, one lek at a time.
meanings.sent5: The shiny lek sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A type of communal courtship display performed by male birds.
meanings.sent1: The male bird's lek attracted many females to watch his dance.
meanings.sent2: During mating season, the male bird would create an elaborate lek to impress the females.
meanings.sent3: The bird's lek was so entertaining that even the squirrels stopped to watch.
meanings.sent4: The lek was like a stage where the male bird showcased his best moves.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feathers on the lek shimmered in the sunlight, mesmerizing the onlookers.

meanings.definition: A type of dance performed in some African cultures.
meanings.sent1: The rhythmic lek captivated the audience with its energy and grace.
meanings.sent2: The dancers moved in perfect harmony during the traditional lek.
meanings.sent3: The lek was so infectious that even the shyest person couldn't resist joining in.
meanings.sent4: The lek seemed to tell a story of unity and celebration through movement.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the costumes added to the beauty of the lek performance.
